effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.4 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 655,651.
Set: When you cast Surging Totem, 2 allies in the radius have Insurance! applied to them. When Insurance! is consumed, your next Chain Heal, Healing Surge, or Healing Wave is increased by 10%.

Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.4 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 655,651.
Set: When you cast Surging Totem, 2 allies in the radius have Insurance! applied to them. When Insurance! is consumed, your next Chain Heal, Healing Surge, or Healing Wave is increased by 10%.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Mug's Moxie Jug

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to send you into a frenzy, granting you 883 Critical Strike for 15 sec. While frenzied, each spell cast grants an additional 883 Critical Strike but does not refresh the duration. This effect may only occur every 1 sec.

description: The word 'Moxie' is hastily scribbled on.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to destabilize the void energy, releasing a corrupted fragment. Retrieving a fragment briefly infuses you with its power, increasing your Intellect by 11,559 for 15 sec.
